courseDescription:
There are several video editing programs on the market but only a handful are beginner-friendly. Wondershare’s Filmora is one of them and includes a suite of cutting-edge tools and a wide range of features to offer a comprehensive video editing software platform. It has a user-friendly interface, drag-and-drop editing capabilities and an extensive set of specialised video editing tools, making it simple to create professional-quality videos. The subject experts at Stay Curious Media Limited have designed this course to walk you through every aspect of this accessible and powerful program.

We begin by examining Filmora's opening interface and then explore its ‘preview’, ‘timeline’ and ‘media’ bar. The course then demonstrates simple actions like ‘project import’, exporting and saving files. We then compare colour correction and colour grading and show you how to use these tools to create different moods in your videos. The course explains how to use basic and advanced Filmora features like transform, compositing, lens correction, auto-enhance and more.

Adding keyframes is a great way to give your videos a professional look and feel. We show you how to use video editing tools like chroma keying (green screen) and freeze frames. The course explores some of the cutting-edge features of Filmora, such as its augmented reality (AR) stickers, AI portraits and the brand-new Boris FX and NewBlue FX plugins. Finally, we teach you how to make effective use of the program’s ‘uniform speed’ and ‘speed ramping’ tools. This course suits anyone who is interested in digital media, either as a professional or passionate amateur. Sign up for this Filmora tutorial to learn how to use this powerful program to edit videos.
